snippet.title: Chicken Police: Into The Hive! - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the Chicken Police: Into The Hive! gameplay reveal trailer for the upcoming character-driven film noir detective adventure. Get a look at what you'll get up to as the feathered cop duo and meet some of the characters who will help you crack a huge conspiracy in the sequel. The trailer also unveils a new mode that lets players experience the game in full color. 

Chicken Police: Into The Hive! will be released on PC in 2024. Those attending gamescom 2023 or PAX West can also try out the game at the studio's booth.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #ChickenPolice
